name: Cupid's Last Stand
description:
Brackeys Game Jam #2 2019 Entry

STORY

HADES, the god of the underworld, has attacked Mount Olympus in ancient Greece. He captured and imprisoned all of the gods. Only tiny CUPID managed to escape, but in the battle he lost his eyes and is blind.

Now HADES is sending his dreadful demons through the HELL MAZE to destroy the Greece civilization.

You found one of CUPID's magical eyes and, together with CUPID on your side, you are ancient Greece only hope to stop HADES!

Go search the maze for demons and keep them in sight long enough so CUPID can disable them with his LOVE ARROWS.

HOW TO PLAY

Move Cupid's eye with [WASD] or [ARROW] keys through the dark maze.

Shoot an arrow by pressing [SPACE]. The arrow will auto target nearby demons when they are in the light/in sight. Arrows have a delayed fire rate. 

Some demons need to be hit multiple times. The floating hitpoints above the demon tells you how many shots you need.

If you are touched by a demon or 10 demons reach the shiny gates to ancient Greece, you lose..
If you kill all the demons before they reach the gates, you win!
